text: Bazoronka ineza nziza bamwe bitaba akamo k’Umuremyi wabo yabateye, nabamwe batitabiye ako kamo naho boba bafise ibiri ngaha kw’Isi hamwe n’ibindi nk’ivyo, ntankeka bari gubitanga mukwikombora kwabo, abo bazoba bafise ibiharuro bibi cane n’ubwicaro bwabo buzoba ari ubwo mumuriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu, kandi n’ahantu habi cane naho hameze gute
